name: FreeFood
description:
You're a starving college student. Tonight, there is a business convention giving out free food, but unfortunately, you're not a business major.

Sneak in and take some food your tuition paid for!

  • A & D to tilt the bowl
  • Left and Right Arrow to control the character
  • Esc to Pause

Head Programmers: Van, Attilio

Art Director: Aly

Lead Sound Designer: Yasmine

<3D assets credits>
